053a24de-cf05-4938-9044-71c614fef78f.description:
#ffffffTool Extra#909292
Place this down if you want the Tool messages to show up in chat.
053a24de-cf05-4938-9044-71c614fef78f.title: Chat Log Block

09caafe0-d7a3-47bf-9ffe-778213105586.description:
#ffffffTool#909292
Placing this part on your creation enables you to copy/paste logic gate connections.

Copy from: #EE7BF0light-pink#909292 logic gate
Paste to: #EEAF5Clight-orange#909292 logic gates
Apply Copy-Paste: Press E on this block

Disclaimer: This will only create new connections, any preexisting connections will be stacked on top!
09caafe0-d7a3-47bf-9ffe-778213105586.title: Connection Copy/Paste

23f93461-dfb5-47c5-b7a8-d3508e56b013.description:
#ffffffLogic Part#909292
To create an #A0EA00interface#909292, connect multiple of these together. The color of the interface determines its purpose.

#EEEEEEInput:#909292
[#A0EA00...#909292]->[#A0EA002#909292]->[#A0EA001#909292]->[Special Block]

#EEEEEEOutput:#909292
[#A0EA00...#909292]<-[#A0EA002#909292]<-[#A0EA001#909292]<-[Special Block]

The LSB is closest to the special block!
23f93461-dfb5-47c5-b7a8-d3508e56b013.title: Interface Block

33ef02f6-22bc-4d85-8760-b78a68daaf4b.description:
#ffffffTool#909292
Placing this part on your creation enables you to quickly make parallel connections.

On/Off: Press E on this block
From: dark-grey (1st) & black (rest)
To: light-grey (1st) & white (rest)
#4A4A4A█#333333█████#909292 -> #7F7F7F█#EEEEEE█████#909292
Connect dark-grey to light-grey! The rest connects automatically.
33ef02f6-22bc-4d85-8760-b78a68daaf4b.title: Parallel Connections

931dfeb6-5286-464d-a965-d310889df33c.description:
#ffffffTool#909292
#D02525WARNING! If used wrong, this may make many, unintended connections. Use with caution, save your creations!#909292

Place this 2x on a creation, connect them together, then paint them in the colors you want to connect stuff with.

From - To:
[#CCCCCCcolor1#909292] -> [#CCCCCCcolor2#909292]
Apply: Press E on this block
931dfeb6-5286-464d-a965-d310889df33c.title: Connection Maker (by Color)

a1180139-1b10-4e6a-8d6f-6aaf7b1785bc.description:
#ffffffLogic Part#909292
This is a Timer with customizable speed.

Press U or Crouch + U to change speed.

(This block won't show when it's activated, still WIP)
a1180139-1b10-4e6a-8d6f-6aaf7b1785bc.title: Quick Timer

bc336a10-675a-4942-94ce-e83ecb4b501a.description:
#ffffffLogic Part#909292
This is a Logic Gate with customizable speed.

Press U or Crouch + U to change speed.
bc336a10-675a-4942-94ce-e83ecb4b501a.title: Quick Logic Gate

c0baf6f4-c260-46a9-9c60-3725e5ced259.description:
#ffffffHandheld Tool#909292

Tools (Toggle with Q):
-Logic Converter (#12AD41Quick#909292 <-> #DF7F00Vanilla#909292)
-Advanced Tool Functions (Configurable)
c0baf6f4-c260-46a9-9c60-3725e5ced259.title: Logic Multitool

e9c429c8-7473-40e3-9f70-4781d1510a42.description:
#ffffffLogic Part Extra#909292
This button is very useful for analyzing #12AD41Quick Logic#909292 circuits.

Reduce the simulation speed to "Single Step" and press this button to continue to the next tick. You will see exactly what happens each individual tick.

Press U or Crouch + U to change (simulation) speed.
e9c429c8-7473-40e3-9f70-4781d1510a42.title: Single Step Button

8f23b687-b62e-4b64-9323-e834111eb35d.description:
#ffffffTool Extra#909292
Connect these to the "Connection Maker (by Color)" to change its functionality. You can make it filter by logic state or by relative position. These can be connected in series to stack the functions.
8f23b687-b62e-4b64-9323-e834111eb35d.title: Color Tool Peripheral

f52c3e45-8d5f-4c34-b9ff-0cef2516e0a4.description:
#ffffffTool#909292
#D02525WARNING! If used wrong, this may make many, unintended connections. Use with caution, save your creations!#909292

Place this 2x on a creation, connect them together, then paint them in the colors you want to copy/paste between.

Copy from - Paste to:
[#CCCCCCcolor1#909292] -> [#CCCCCCcolor2#909292]
Apply: Press E on this block
f52c3e45-8d5f-4c34-b9ff-0cef2516e0a4.title: Connection Copy/Paste (by Color)
